mean_cn: n. 绰号；诨号；昵称；  vt. 起绰号；叫错…的名字
mean_en: a name (such as “Moose” or “Lady Bird”) that is different from your real name but is what your family, friends, etc., call you when they are talking to you or about you
word_etyma: nick挑毛病 + name名字 → nickname 绰号
sentence: When I was a little child, my nickname was "Goudan".
sentence_trans: 小时候的的绰号是“狗蛋”。
